data: “Rod!” Perry Wilcox shouted above the sound of bracewires singing in the slipstream: “In the name of Mathuselah! Look! there!”
"Rod!" Perry Wilcox shouted above the sound of bracewires singing in the slipstream: "In the name of Mathuselah! Look! there!"
Gallun, Raymond Z. (Raymond Zinke), 1911-1994; Krupa, Julian S., 1913-1989 [Illustrator]
